Class AlgSource 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----AlgSource
public abstract class AlgSource
extends Object
AlgSource.java abstract class for the sourcecode of the algorithm. extend and initialize code in the constructor.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

code
holds code for algorithm.
i
holds current end of code, modified when setup adds code.
static_i
holds end of code, not including setup.

AlgSource()

add_code(String)
adds a line of the algorithms setup code.
get_code(int)
get the specified line of code.
get_lines_of_code()
returns the current number of lines of code, including setup.
reset()
deletes all code from the user's setup of the algorithm.

code 
 protected String code[]
holds code for algorithm.

i 
 protected int i
holds current end of code, modified when setup adds code.

static_i 
 protected int static_i
holds end of code, not including setup.

AlgSource 
 public AlgSource()

reset 
 public void reset()
deletes all code from the user's setup of the algorithm.

add_code 
 public void add_code(String s)
adds a line of the algorithms setup code.

get_code 
 public String get_code(int index)
get the specified line of code.

get_lines_of_code 
 public int get_lines_of_code()
returns the current number of lines of code, including setup.
